name: Bike Share for All (Bay Wheels)
description: Discounted bike share membership for income-eligible riders
fullDescription: Bay Wheels (operated by Lyft) is the Bay Area's bike share system with thousands of bikes available at stations throughout San Francisco, Oakland, Berkeley, and San Jose. Bike Share for All makes it affordable for low-income residents.
whatTheyOffer:
- Discounted annual membership: $5/year for first year (regularly $149)
- Unlimited 60-minute rides on classic bikes
- Reduced per-minute rates for e-bikes
- No credit card requiredâ€”can pay with cash or prepaid card
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the Bike Share for All website or call customer service
2. Provide proof of eligibility (Clipper START, Calfresh/EBT, or income verification)
3. Complete enrollment online or at a Lyft community hub
4. Receive your membership and start riding
keywords: Bay Wheels, bike share, Lyft, bicycle, e-bike, low-income, discount, San Francisco, Oakland, Berkeley, San Jose
